title: CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set General Household Hand Kit with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case Orange
descriptions:
Introducing the CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set General Household Hand Kit with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case in a vibrant orange color! This tool set is perfect for elderly folks who enjoy tackling small repairs and DIY projects around the house. 

With a total of 39 essential tools included, such as a hammer, pliers, screwdrivers, and a tape measure, this kit has everything you need to get the job done. The tools are made to last, with a durable construction that is both heat treated and chrome plated, ensuring they can withstand heavy use. Plus, they are corrosion resistant, so you won't have to worry about rust.

The plastic toolbox storage case is designed to keep your tools organized and easily accessible. It features separate tool compartments, allowing you to find the right tool quickly and efficiently. The lightweight design and convenient carrying handle make it easy to transport the toolbox wherever you need it.

This tool set is ideal for both DIY amateurs and avid handymen. It is suitable for small repairs and DIY projects, providing you with the tools you need to tackle any task. The eye-catching orange color adds a touch of style to your tool collection.
